events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car at an intersection last night.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords related to car collision reported.
A claims agent was promptly assigned to assist the customer with the auto accident claim process.
The claim has been acknowledged by the insurance company and an initial case number issued.
Customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and police report from the collision.
All requested documents, including photos and police report, were submitted by the customer on time.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to determine liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the other driver’s fault in the car collision incident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the proposed offer and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling.
Claim approval was finalized internally following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued directly to the customer’s bank account.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and customer confirmation of receipt.
All records and documents related to the auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
